articles.author: Erik Hall
articles.title: Illinois vs. Indiana game ends in fracas, IU's Oumar Ballo ejected - Alton Telegraph
articles.description: A late-game fracas in the Illinois vs. Indiana Hoosiers men's basketball game led to the ejection of Indiana's Oumar Ballo.
articles.content: Oumar Ballo #11 of the Indiana Hoosiers dunks the ball past Tomislav Ivisic #13 of the Illinois Fighting Illini in the first half at Simon Skjodt Assembly Hall on Jan. 14, 2025, in Bloomington, India… [+2985 chars]
